fullplot: Simon Birch tells the story of Joe and Simon's heart-warming journey of friendship. Simon Birch was born with a condition that makes him much smaller than all the other kids in town. Now, due to his condition, Simon thinks God made him this way for a reason and highly believes in God. Together, Joe and Simon go on a journey of trust and friendship to find the answers to many things. Their friendship is put to the test when some unfortunate events happen.
plot: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.
title: Simon Birch

tomatoes.consensus: Overly mushy; tries too hard to pull at the heart-strings.
